程序包 com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.signup.signupFlows

类 SignupFlowController3

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.BaseController
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.signup.signupFlows.SignupFlowController3
public class SignupFlowController3 extends BaseController
Controller for the third step of the signup flow. Handles user input for financial information, validation, and registration logic.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, sets up input filters, actions, and populates fields if userData is present.

    • goBackToSignupFlow2

      public void goBackToSignupFlow2()
      Handles the action to go back to the second signup step. Saves the current input data and loads the previous step.

    • register

      public void register() throws IOException
      Handles the registration process, validates input, submits the registration request, and navigates to login.
      抛出:
      IOException - if loading the login FXML fails

    • goBackToLogin

      public void goBackToLogin() throws IOException
      Switches the scene to the login page.
